backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing nakshatra calculations, user profiles, logs, and access control with helpers for degree validation and daily state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, and confidence levels for release validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose and UI behavior of various frontend React components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app with dark mode class, fonts, and cache-control headers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in a dark-theme provider with toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertsTog: Toggle switch component enabling or disabling nakshatra alerts using a custom bell glyph.
frontend/src/components/alerts/Nakshatra: Banner shown when the nakshatra changes, displaying a shift message and dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper component that displays a sign-in prompt when a user is not authenticated.
Dialog for selecting a city or using geolocation, including search, validation, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/errors/Connectio: Displays a connection error with retry button and optional sanitized error details.
frontend/src/components/glyphs/Glyph.tsx: Renders various SVG glyph icons based on a provided type.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Provides the main site header with navigation, city picker, alerts toggle, and login.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the overall page layout with header, content outlet, and footer including app version.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Naksha: Shows a clickable card summarizing a Nakshatra with name, number, deity, symbols, and ruler.
Renders detailed Nakshatra sections including symbolism, traits, and related thematic content.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Transi: Calculates and displays estimated times for next Pada and Nakshatra transitions based on city timezone.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyGuida: Shows expandable daily guidance modules for a given Nakshatra, each with themed content and icons.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyInter: Renders daily interpretation content for a given Nakshatra using card sections for emotional, mental, social, and narrative descriptions.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyLogsP: Provides UI forms for daily mood, energy, sleep, and dream logs, saving entries via user log hooks.
frontend/src/components/today/ResonanceS: Displays whether the current Nakshatra resonates with a user's birth chart, showing Moon or Atmakaraka activations.
frontend/src/data/cities.ts: Exports a list of world cities with names, timezones, and coordinates for location selection.
Contains structured daily interpretation text for each Nakshatra, including emotional tone, themes, and guidance.
frontend/src/data/nakshatras.ts: Defines full Nakshatra metadata including symbols, deity, traits, and padas for astrological reference.
frontend/src/hooks/actorQueryKey.ts: Builds a stable react-query key for actor-related queries, avoiding undefined elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorInitStatus.ts: Tracks the initialization state of the actor via react-query and provides retry helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorStable.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor, reinitializing when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCitySelection.ts: Manages selected city with validation, localStorage sync, and live local-time updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Syncs state with localStorage, supporting cross-tab and same-tab updates with change notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraAlerts.ts: Tracks Nakshatra changes and shows an alert banner when a new Nakshatra is detected.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraNow.ts: Computes current lunar longitude and fetches Nakshatra data based on city and computed values.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines Nakshatra query logic using actor readiness and longitude validation, with error logging and force-refetch support.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserLogs.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and saving user logs through the backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile and birth chart using React Query and an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom light/dark theme CSS variables and typography rules.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports a constant indicating the appâ€™s version string.
frontend/src/lib/astro/lunarLongitude.ts: Calculates an approximate lunar longitude for a given date using a simplified astronomical formula.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/nakshatraDi: Provides logging utilities and helpers for validating and normalizing lunar longitude inputs.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/sanitizeErr: Converts unknown error values into safe display strings with fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/insights/dreamThemeExtr: Extracts keyword themes from dream logs grouped by Nakshatra with basic stopword filtering.
frontend/src/lib/insights/nakshatraInsig: Generates up to three insight strings from patterns in check-in, sleep, and dream logs grouped by Nakshatra.
frontend/src/lib/nakshatra/index.ts: Utility functions for transforming Nakshatra names to slugs and retrieving data by slug.
frontend/src/lib/time/timezone.ts: Timezone utilities for formatting and generating Date objects representing local time in a target timezone.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryInsightsPage.t: Displays user insights, history, and dream themes with tabs, loading states, and auth gating.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Searchable list page showing all Nakshatras with filtering and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/NakshatraDetailPage.t: Displays detailed information for a specific nakshatra using its slug, showing name, number, themes, and related sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Provides authenticated users with forms to edit profile info and birth chart settings, loading existing data via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.tsx: Determines and displays the current nakshatra with error handling, location status, guidance modules, and premium resonance sections.
frontend/src/pages/TomorrowPage.tsx: Computes tomorrow's lunar longitude to fetch and show the next day's nakshatra with diagnostic and error handling states.
frontend/src/pages/VisualStyleSystemPage: Empty placeholder page for visual style system content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, container settings, fonts, shadows, and animations for the project.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, feature lists, and pending requests for Version 22 deployment.
